sentences.sContent: In our world, not only do we have variability, we've got unpredictability.
sentences.sContent_eng: In our world, not only do we have variability, we've got unpredictability.
sentences.sCn: 在我们的世界不仅有可变性，还有不可预见性。

sentences.sContent: There are many problems with rankings, especially the metrics used and the variability.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are many problems with rankings, especially the metrics used and the variability.
sentences.sCn: 排名有很多问题，特别是排名所依据的指标和排名的可变性。

sentences.sContent: Abstract: : housing demand and housing adaptability, variability is not coordination problem of current our country city housing is very serious.
sentences.sContent_eng: Abstract: : housing demand and housing adaptability, variability is not coordination problem of current our country city housing is very serious.
sentences.sCn: 摘要： 当前我国城市住宅中居住需求与住宅适应性、可变性不相协调的问题十分突出。

synos.tran: [生物][数]可变性，变化性；变异性

words.tran: 变量的；可变的；易变的，多变的；变异的，[生物] 畸变的
多变的；各式各样的；杂色的
变化；[生物] 变异，变种
[数] 变量；可变物，可变因素
变异；变化；不一致；分歧；[数] 方差
改变；使多样化（vary的过去式和过去分词形式）
